title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields. The integration build on 09/17 shows that the page looks bad on all motif platforms. On motif, these text fields get automatic borders that identify them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds, which make them stand out even worse.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders, making them look like user input targets. On Solaris/AIX/HPUX, the fields have different colored backgrounds, further highlighting them.
EB: On motif platforms, the Project Properties Info page should not use text fields with automatic borders. On Solaris/AIX/HPUX, the fields should not have different colored backgrounds.
